Carpenter - Class in jobs
A specialization of Man.
Carpenter(int, int, Money, int, int, int) - Constructor for class jobs.Carpenter

The Man object create a random name automatically.

CitizenList - Class in main
This class store a ObjectsList for the citizens that populate the map.
CitizenList() - Constructor for class main.CitizenList
The empty constructor initialize the ObjectsList to a new empty ObjectsList and the IDs attribute to 1.
Because of that every time that a new citizen is created its possible to control the ids.
collectTaxes(CitizenList) - Method in class jobs.Mayor
This method run over one CitizenList object and collect a 5% of the total money of each citizen.

crushingGoldOre(GoldOreMineral) - Method in class jobs.Miner
This method takes an object of type GoldOreMineral to "grind" it into mined gold.
cutTree(Tree) - Method in class jobs.Lumberjack
This method read the amount value for one tree and then create a new WoodPlanks object with the amount value equals to (tree.amount/1.8).
For example if the original tree have a 180 in the amount value then it will be created a WoodPlanks object with 100 on the amount value.
Also the method take the name of the tree and generate a new line for the action log showing the type of the tree and the amount of wooded planks generated.
